name: Figure
description: A container component that presents and formats visual content such as images along with optional captions to enhance understanding and context.

attributes.description: Additional HTML attributes for the figure element.

modifier_class.description: Additional CSS classes for styling customization.

caption.description: Image caption content that provides additional context or description.

slots.caption: Figure image caption providing context about the image content.

examples.name: Figure without Caption
examples.description: Figure with image only, no caption

examples.name: Figure with Dimensions
examples.description: Figure with specified width and height

slots.caption: Figure with specified dimensions for better layout control.

when_to_use: Display content images that require captions or additional context
Present visual content in a consistent, accessible format across your website
Showcase images that need to be enlarged for better viewing of details
Format images within content areas where the visual needs to stand apart from surrounding text
Provide proper attribution or citation for visual content
when_not_to_use: The image is purely decorative and requires no caption or context
The visual content would be better served as a background image
You need a complex gallery of multiple images (use a gallery component instead)
The image is part of a more complex component such as a card or banner
You need interactive image features beyond simple enlargement
best_practices: Provide concise, informative captions that add context rather than repeating surrounding content
Use appropriately sized and optimised images to balance quality with performance
Ensure the figure and its caption maintain their relationship and readability across all screen sizes
Always include alternative text for images to ensure screen reader users understand the content
Position figures to complement the surrounding content flow rather than disrupting it
known_issues: Image loading performance: Large images may impact page load times
Mobile responsiveness: Very wide images may cause horizontal scrolling on small screens
Caption positioning: Long captions may affect layout consistency

findings: Responsive media in default body location was limited in width (~670px desktop), making it less immersive
Limited space made it difficult to view and understand finer details of media content
When enlarged, content becomes primary focus in separate modal that hides potential distractions

variations: Light theme: Appropriate contrast for light backgrounds
Dark theme: Appropriate contrast for dark backgrounds
With caption: Figure including descriptive caption
